about_the_game:
Allakin is a little apprentice magician who one day finds an ancient sealed portal in a remote forest.
Curious as he is, he tries to open it with the help of his magician's book, which he then succeeds in doing, after a few attempts, with the help of a portal crystal.
Courageous and full of curiosity about what is behind the portal, he steps through it and is thereby transported to another world.
But unfortunately it is very difficult for him to get away from there and every new portal seems to pull him further and further into the world.
In the search for new portal crystals there are many dangers and tricky puzzles on his way back home...

Accompany Allakin through his exciting journey in a varied platformer platformer.
Trick your opponents with skill and solve the puzzles to magically advance into new worlds.



Allakin offers everything a great puzzle platformer needs

  • Jump 'n' Run, skill and lots of puzzle elements
  • Hidden secrets and paths
  • Obtain new skills that will take you to new places
  • Lots of different and varied levels
  • A nice story
  • and a lot more...
detailed_description:
Update Notes

Demo update 1.04:
Camera controls have now been optimized for keyboard and mouse control

Allakin is a little apprentice magician who one day finds an ancient sealed portal in a remote forest.
Curious as he is, he tries to open it with the help of his magician's book, which he then succeeds in doing, after a few attempts, with the help of a portal crystal.

In the search for new portal crystals there are many dangers and tricky puzzles on his way back home...

name: Allakin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i3 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers

short_description: Help Allakin find his way back home and defeat the dark force in many varied magical jump and run levels
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
